word:
Chap. 9 - Earmarks of Erroneous Teaching
-

         Further Communications to Mr. Garmire 

     Since visiting your house Sabbath afternoon, August 23, some things have rested on my mind to say to you. I have no hesitancy in saying that Anna's visions are not of God. The dreams that the members of your family have had are a deception of Satan. . . .
